cards.name: Aegis Angel
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

cards.flavor: Stand your post for duty. Stand your ground for honor.
cards.name: Marked by Honor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)

cards.flavor: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.
cards.name: Serra Angel
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

cards.flavor: Wind is forceful, yet ephemeral. It can knock a dragon out of the sky, yet pass through the smallest crack unhindered.
cards.name: Air Servant
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.

cards.flavor: It's pointless to hold on when you have nothing to hold on with.
cards.name: Disperse
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: "A riddle is nothing more than a trap for small minds, baited with the promise of understanding."
cards.name: Sphinx of Magosi
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{U}: Draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on Sphinx of Magosi.

cards.flavor:
"It saddens me to lose a source of inspiration. This one seemed especially promising."
—Ashiok
cards.name: Mind Rot

cards.flavor: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.
cards.name: Nightmare
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

cards.flavor: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.
cards.name: Sengir Vampire
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

cards.flavor:
"Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared."
—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia
cards.name: Walking Corpse

cards.flavor: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.
cards.name: Borderland Marauder
cards.text: Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Cone of Flame
cards.text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

cards.flavor: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.
cards.name: Shivan Dragon
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Tie a mouse under a bridge, and your cabbages will triple in size."
—Kithkin superstition
cards.name: Incremental Growth
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, two +1/+1 counters on another target creature, and three +1/+1 counters on a third target creature.

cards.flavor:
"When the beast cloaks itself in the mighty oak, what good is a bow? When the oak wraps itself around the snarling beast, what good is a hatchet?"
—Dionus, elvish archdruid
cards.name: Oakenform
Soul of the Harvest
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.
